backlog.title: Create data models and exceptions
backlog.description: Create core data models for trades, positions, and market data. Include custom exception hierarchy for trading errors (InvalidTradeError, InsufficientFundsError, MarketClosedError).
acceptance_criteria: Trade dataclass with: symbol, side, quantity, price, timestamp
Position dataclass with: symbol, quantity, avg_price, unrealized_pnl
MarketData dataclass with: symbol, bid, ask, last, volume

backlog.title: Implement portfolio calculator
backlog.description: Create portfolio analytics calculator that computes total value, P&L, exposure by symbol, and risk metrics. Uses the data models from CORE-001.
acceptance_criteria: Handles edge cases: empty portfolio, missing market data

context.notes: This is the core analytics engine - quality is critical

backlog.title: Add SQLite storage layer
backlog.description: Implement SQLite-based storage for trades and positions. Include CRUD operations and query methods for historical data.
acceptance_criteria: save_trade(trade) and get_trades(symbol, start_date, end_date) methods

backlog.title: Create CLI interface
backlog.description: Build command-line interface using argparse. Commands: portfolio (show current positions), history (show trade history), analyze (run analytics on portfolio).

backlog.title: Write comprehensive documentation
backlog.description: Create user documentation including installation, quick start, API reference, and examples.
acceptance_criteria: README.md with installation and quick start
